Activity: Arrive at work, grab a latte, and check emails. Respond to any urgent messages. Put on a playlist of upbeat pop music to get energized.

Meeting with @pm-1 to discuss the timeline for the client documentation and onboarding process. Take detailed notes and clarify any outstanding questions. Emphasize the importance of a seamless client experience.

Begin refining the onboarding process based on internal review feedback. Focus on identifying areas for improvement and streamlining the process to make it as efficient as possible. Think about the client's perspective - what would make them feel valued and informed?
Lunch with @onbd-1! Chat about the challenges and opportunities in client onboarding. Share tips and tricks for building rapport with UHNWI clients.
Continue working on refining the onboarding process. Create a flowchart or diagram to visualize the process and identify potential bottlenecks. Research best practices for UHNWI client onboarding.

Prepare a presentation outlining the refined onboarding process. Highlight the key benefits for clients and the steps involved in ensuring a smooth and successful onboarding experience. Keep it visually appealing - use lots of images and graphs!
Review the presentation with @coo-1 and @ir-1. Incorporate their feedback and make any necessary revisions. Quick check on online shopping before heading out.
